mainPage.mainTitle: Online Banking App  centred around the needs of its customers
mainPage.descr: We are still working on the app, leave your email and we will notify you when the app goes into beta

startUsage.title: Easy way to start using
startUsage.descr1: Easy installation of the app using AppStore or Google play
startUsage.descr2: Go through a simple identity verification procedure with no branches or queues
startUsage.descr3: Choose the currency or crypto you want and create an account in 2 minutes
startUsage.descr4: Pay, Receive, Trade, Transfer, and get cashback

application.title: Mobile application
application.adv6: Simple and easy to use interface

whyUs.title: Why is Cpay special?
whyUs.descr: We help you solve all financial problems easily and conveniently. We know what you like. We know how to get it!
whyUs.descr1: Our ecosystem based on financial and lifestyle services
whyUs.descr2: Support popular blockchain networks and tokens
whyUs.descr3: Manage your finances from the comfort of your couch right in the app
whyUs.descr4: User-friendly interface that every user can understand
whyUs.descr5: Our experts are ready to support you even on January 1
whyUs.descr6: Additional biometric protection for your security
whyUs.descr7: You can become the owner of a virtual crypto or multicurrency card
whyUs.descr8: Make transfers and pay for purchases in any country in the world

security.title: Safety and security
security.descr1: We care about the safety of our clients' funds and provide an increased level of control at each stage of financial transactions
security.descr2: The highest standards of implementation give users the reliability of using the multicurrency wallet for personal and corporate purposes around the world

downloadApp.title1: Become the first customer of the bank of the future
downloadApp.descr: We are still working on the app, leave your email and get a chance to be one of the first to try the app
